nodes.id: 国家中医药管理局

zh-cn: 国家中医药管理局
en: National Administration of Traditional Chinese Medicine

location.zh-cn: 北京市东城区工体西路1号
location.en: No. 1 Gongti West Road, Dongcheng District, Beijing

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院下属的、由国家卫生健康委员会管理的副部级国家局，负责管理中医药行业。
description.en: A vice-ministerial-level state administration under the State Council of the People's Republic of China, managed by the National Health Commission, responsible for overseeing the traditional Chinese medicine industry.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国家卫生健康委员会

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家卫生健康委员会
国家卫生健康委员会
国家卫生健康委
en: National Health Commission of the People's Republic of China
National Health Commission
NHC

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院主管卫生健康工作的组成部门。国家中医药管理局的业务上级单位。
description.en: A constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China responsible for national health and hygiene work. It is the supervising authority for the National Administration of Traditional Chinese Medicine.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院
国务院
en: State Council of the People's Republic of China
State Council

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家行政机关。国家中医药管理局的组织上级单位。
description.en: The chief administrative authority of the People's Republic of China. It is the organizational superior of the National Administration of Traditional Chinese Medicine.

nodes.id: 余艳红

zh-cn: 余艳红
en: Yu Yanhong

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任国家中医药管理局局长、党组书记，国家卫生健康委员会党组成员，兼任全国妇联副主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently serving as Director and Party Group Secretary of the National Administration of Traditional Chinese Medicine, a member of the Party Group of the National Health Commission, and concurrently Vice Chairperson of the All-China Women's Federation.

nodes.id: 全国妇联

zh-cn: 全国妇联
en: All-China Women's Federation

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的全国性妇女组织。
description.en: The national women's organization of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 王志勇

zh-cn: 王志勇
en: Wang Zhiyong

description.zh-cn: 国家中医药管理局副局长。
description.en: Deputy Director of the National Administration of Traditional Chinese Medicine.

nodes.id: 黄璐琦

zh-cn: 黄璐琦
en: Huang Luqi

description.zh-cn: 国家中医药管理局副局长，兼任中国中医科学院院长。
description.en: Deputy Director of the National Administration of Traditional Chinese Medicine and concurrently President of the China Academy of Chinese Medical Sciences.

nodes.id: 王思成

zh-cn: 王思成
en: Wang Sicheng

description.zh-cn: 国家中医药管理局副局长。
description.en: Deputy Director of the National Administration of Traditional Chinese Medicine.

nodes.id: 陆建伟

zh-cn: 陆建伟
en: Lu Jianwei

description.zh-cn: 国家中医药管理局副局长。
description.en: Deputy Director of the National Administration of Traditional Chinese Medicine.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国卫生部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国卫生部
卫生部
en: Ministry of Health of the People's Republic of China
Ministry of Health

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院原组成部门，2013年并入新组建的国家卫生和计划生育委员会。
description.en: A former constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, merged into the newly formed National Health and Family Planning Commission in 2013.

nodes.id: 第十三届全国人民代表大会第一次会议

zh-cn: 第十三届全国人民代表大会第一次会议
en: First Session of the 13th National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 该会议通过了《国务院机构改革方案》。
description.en: This session passed the 'Institutional Reform Plan of the State Council'.

nodes.id: 国务院机构改革方案

zh-cn: 国务院机构改革方案
en: Institutional Reform Plan of the State Council

description.zh-cn: 2018年由第十三届全国人民代表大会第一次会议批准的机构改革方案，该方案决定组建国家卫生健康委员会，并规定国家中医药管理局由其管理。
description.en: An institutional reform plan approved by the First Session of the 13th National People's Congress in 2018, which stipulated the formation of the National Health Commission and that the National Administration of Traditional Chinese Medicine would be managed by it.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国家卫生和计划生育委员会

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家卫生和计划生育委员会
国家卫生和计划生育委员会
en: National Health and Family Planning Commission of the People's Republic of China
National Health and Family Planning Commission

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院原组成部门，在2018年国务院机构改革中被撤销，其职能并入新组建的国家卫生健康委员会。
description.en: A former constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, which was dissolved during the 2018 institutional reform of the State Council, with its functions merged into the newly established National Health Commission.

nodes.id: 国务院深化医药卫生体制改革领导小组办公室

zh-cn: 国务院深化医药卫生体制改革领导小组办公室
en: Office of the State Council Leading Group for Deepening Medical and Health System Reform

description.zh-cn: 原国务院议事协调机构的办事机构，在2018年国务院机构改革中被撤销。
description.en: The former administrative office for a deliberative and coordinative agency of the State Council, which was abolished during the 2018 institutional reform of the State Council.

nodes.id: 清肺排毒汤

zh-cn: 清肺排毒汤
en: Qingfei Paidu Tang

description.zh-cn: 一种中药方剂，由国家中医药管理局在2019冠状病毒病疫情期间发布，作为推荐治疗方案之一。
description.en: A traditional Chinese medicine formula released by the National Administration of Traditional Chinese Medicine during the COVID-19 pandemic as one of the recommended treatment protocols.

nodes.id: 2019冠状病毒病

zh-cn: 2019冠状病毒病
en: COVID-19

description.zh-cn: 一场全球性大流行病，由严重急性呼吸系统综合征冠状病毒2（SARS-CoV-2）引起。
description.en: A global pandemic caused by Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome Coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).

nodes.id: 中国民间中医医药研究开发协会

zh-cn: 中国民间中医医药研究开发协会
en: China Association of Research and Development of Traditional Chinese Medicine

description.zh-cn: 原由国家中医药管理局主管的行业协会，2020年8月与其脱钩，独立运行。
description.en: An industry association formerly supervised by the National Administration of Traditional Chinese Medicine, which decoupled from it in August 2020 to operate independently.

nodes.id: 中国中医药研究促进会

zh-cn: 中国中医药研究促进会
en: China Association for the Promotion of Traditional Chinese Medicine Research

description.zh-cn: 原由国家中医药管理局主管的行业协会，2020年8月与其脱钩，独立运行。
description.en: An industry association formerly supervised by the National Administration of Traditional Chinese Medicine, which decoupled from it in August 2020 to operate independently.

nodes.id: 中国中医药科技发展中心

zh-cn: 中国中医药科技发展中心
国家中医药管理局人才交流中心
en: China Center for T.C.M. Development & Exchange

description.zh-cn: 国家中医药管理局于2020年设立的直属事业单位。
description.en: A directly affiliated public institution established by the National Administration of Traditional Chinese Medicine in 2020.

nodes.id: 国家中医药博物馆

zh-cn: 国家中医药博物馆
en: National Museum of Traditional Chinese Medicine

description.zh-cn: 国家中医药管理局于2020年设立的直属事业单位。
description.en: A directly affiliated public institution established by the National Administration of Traditional Chinese Medicine in 2020.

nodes.id: 国家中医药管理局监测统计中心

zh-cn: 国家中医药管理局监测统计中心
en: Monitoring and Statistics Center of National Administration of Traditional Chinese Medicine

description.zh-cn: 国家中医药管理局于2020年设立的直属事业单位。
description.en: A directly affiliated public institution established by the National Administration of Traditional Chinese Medicine in 2020.

nodes.id: 中西医结合与少数民族医药司

zh-cn: 中西医结合与少数民族医药司
en: Department of Integrated TCM and Western Medicine and Ethnic Minority Medicine

description.zh-cn: 国家中医药管理局于2022年新组建的内设机构。
description.en: An internal department of the National Administration of Traditional Chinese Medicine newly established in 2022.

nodes.id: 中国中医科学院

zh-cn: 中国中医科学院
en: China Academy of Chinese Medical Sciences

description.zh-cn: 国家中医药管理局直属的、中国规模最大、学科齐全、设备先进、科研力量雄厚的中医药研究机构。
description.en: Directly affiliated with the National Administration of Traditional Chinese Medicine, it is China's largest, most comprehensive, and well-equipped research institution for traditional Chinese medicine with strong scientific research capabilities.

nodes.id: 于文明

zh-cn: 于文明
en: Yu Wenming

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任国家中医药管理局局长。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as the Director of the National Administration of Traditional Chinese Medicine.

nodes.id: 国家中医药管理局综合司

zh-cn: 国家中医药管理局综合司
en: General Office of the National Administration of Traditional Chinese Medicine

description.zh-cn: 国家中医药管理局内设机构。
description.en: An internal department of the National Administration of Traditional Chinese Medicine.

nodes.id: 国家中医药管理局医政司

zh-cn: 国家中医药管理局医政司
en: Department of Medical Administration of the National Administration of Traditional Chinese Medicine

description.zh-cn: 国家中医药管理局内设机构。
description.en: An internal department of the National Administration of Traditional Chinese Medicine.

nodes.id: 中国中医科学院西苑医院

zh-cn: 中国中医科学院西苑医院
en: Xiyuan Hospital of China Academy of Chinese Medical Sciences

description.zh-cn: 国家中医药管理局管理的医院。
description.en: A hospital managed by the National Administration of Traditional Chinese Medicine.

nodes.id: 中国中医科学院广安门医院

zh-cn: 中国中医科学院广安门医院
en: Guang'anmen Hospital of China Academy of Chinese Medical Sciences

description.zh-cn: 国家中医药管理局管理的医院。
description.en: A hospital managed by the National Administration of Traditional Chinese Medicine.

nodes.id: 北京中医药大学东方医院

zh-cn: 北京中医药大学东方医院
en: Dongfang Hospital, Beijing University of Chinese Medicine

description.zh-cn: 国家中医药管理局管理的医院。
description.en: A hospital managed by the National Administration of Traditional Chinese Medicine.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国家卫生健康委员会

description.zh-cn: 根据2018年国务院机构改革方案，国家中医药管理局由新组建的国家卫生健康委员会管理。
description.en: According to the 2018 State Council institutional reform plan, the National Administration of Traditional Chinese Medicine is managed by the newly established National Health Commission.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 国家中医药管理局是中华人民共和国国务院下属的国家局。
description.en: The National Administration of Traditional Chinese Medicine is a state administration under the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 1986年，国务院决定创立国家中医药管理局。
description.en: In 1986, the State Council decided to establish the National Administration of Traditional Chinese Medicine.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国卫生部

description.zh-cn: 1988年起，国家中医药管理局由卫生部归口管理。此关系持续至2013年卫生部改组为止。
description.en: Since 1988, the National Administration of Traditional Chinese Medicine was placed under the management of the Ministry of Health. This relationship continued until the ministry's reorganization in 2013.

relationships.source: 第十三届全国人民代表大会第一次会议

description.zh-cn: 会议批准了《国务院机构改革方案》。
description.en: The session approved the 'Institutional Reform Plan of the State Council'.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国家卫生健康委员会

description.zh-cn: 该方案规定组建国家卫生健康委员会。
description.en: The plan stipulated the formation of the National Health Commission.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国家卫生和计划生育委员会

description.zh-cn: 该方案规定不再保留国家卫生和计划生育委员会。
description.en: The plan stipulated the dissolution of the National Health and Family Planning Commission.

relationships.target: 国务院深化医药卫生体制改革领导小组办公室

description.zh-cn: 该方案规定不再设立国务院深化医药卫生体制改革领导小组办公室。
description.en: The plan stipulated the abolition of the Office of the State Council Leading Group for Deepening Medical and Health System Reform.

description.zh-cn: 发布“清肺排毒汤”处方，作为应对2019冠状病毒病的治疗措施。
description.en: Published the formula for 'Qingfei Paidu Tang' as a treatment measure for COVID-19.

description.zh-cn: 作为对付2019冠状病毒病的传统医学治疗措施之一。
description.en: As one of the traditional Chinese medicine treatment measures to combat COVID-19.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国家卫生健康委员会

relationships.source: 国家中医药管理局综合司

description.zh-cn: 国家中医药管理局综合司是国家中医药管理局的内设机构。
description.en: The General Office is an internal department of the National Administration of Traditional Chinese Medicine.

relationships.source: 国家中医药管理局医政司

description.zh-cn: 国家中医药管理局医政司是国家中医药管理局的内设机构。
description.en: The Department of Medical Administration is an internal department of the National Administration of Traditional Chinese Medicine.

relationships.source: 中西医结合与少数民族医药司

description.zh-cn: 中西医结合与少数民族医药司是国家中医药管理局的内设机构。
description.en: The Department of Integrated TCM and Western Medicine and Ethnic Minority Medicine is an internal department of the National Administration of Traditional Chinese Medicine.

description.zh-cn: 中国中医科学院是国家中医药管理局的直属事业单位。
description.en: The China Academy of Chinese Medical Sciences is a directly affiliated public institution of the National Administration of Traditional Chinese Medicine.

relationships.source: 中国中医科学院西苑医院

description.zh-cn: 中国中医科学院西苑医院是国家中医药管理局管理的医院。
description.en: Xiyuan Hospital of China Academy of Chinese Medical Sciences is a hospital managed by the National Administration of Traditional Chinese Medicine.

relationships.source: 中国中医科学院广安门医院

description.zh-cn: 中国中医科学院广安门医院是国家中医药管理局管理的医院。
description.en: Guang'anmen Hospital of China Academy of Chinese Medical Sciences is a hospital managed by the National Administration of Traditional Chinese Medicine.

relationships.source: 北京中医药大学东方医院

description.zh-cn: 北京中医药大学东方医院是国家中医药管理局管理的医院。
description.en: Dongfang Hospital, Beijing University of Chinese Medicine is a hospital managed by the National Administration of Traditional Chinese Medicine.
